title: Sparkling Vaalalu Bangles: Modern Elegance Meets Tradition
materials: 22K Yellow Gold with meticulously set Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Features our signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster and shine.
features: These delicate Vaalalu bangles feature a slender, modern design with evenly spaced CZ stones set in a secure prong setting. The zig-zag pattern adds a touch of contemporary flair to the traditional bangle form.
colors: Golden yellow (gold) and dazzling white (CZ stones).
occasions: or as a sophisticated addition to your traditional attire during weddings (pellilu) and celebrations. They make a beautiful gift for a loved one on occasions like birthdays or anniversaries.
description: These bangles seamlessly blend modern design with traditional South Indian aesthetics. The high-quality CZ stones offer a brilliant sparkle, mimicking the look of diamonds at a more accessible price point. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures long-lasting shine and durability. Lightweight and comfortable to wear.
